body.p: The IASB discussed these matters and concluded that IFRS 9 provides an adequate basis to determine the required accounting for each of these matters. Therefore, considering the objective of Phase 2, the IASB made no amendments for these matters. Specific to paragraph BC5.319(f), the IASB observed that the practical expedient in paragraph 5.4.7 of IFRS 9 would apply to such a host contract if the conditions set out in paragraph 5.4.7 of IFRS 9 are met.
